articles.title: Tsunami warnings lifted after magnitude 8.8 earthquake off Russia's coast
articles.description: An 8.8 magnitude earthquake struck off Russia's Pacific coast, triggering tsunami warnings across the Pacific, including Japan and the US West Coast. While some areas experienced waves and evacuations, major damage was largely avoided. [1, 3, 5, 11, 13, 17]

articles.title: Trump slams India and Russia as dead economies in fresh attack
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump announced new tariffs, including a 25% tariff on Indian imports and a 50% tariff on most Brazilian goods. He also made controversial remarks, calling India and Russia "dead economies." [1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 16, 17, 20]

articles.title: Turbulence forces Delta flight to land and sends 25 passengers to hospitals, airline says
articles.description: A Delta Airlines flight from Salt Lake City to Amsterdam experienced severe turbulence, forcing an emergency landing in Minneapolis. Twenty-five passengers were hospitalized due to injuries. [1, 6, 15, 19]
